runs.comm: good start. Back of a length outside off, Mustafa thinks of playing a stroke but then decides against it
massive slog attempted. Taskin has a word with the batsman. Runs down the track and looks to hit the cover off the ball. Misses completely

dropped. Should have been taken. Big chance. Mustafa gets off the mark. Length delivery, shaping away from Mustafa who pokes at it and gets a thick outside edge which carries at a comfortable height to Sarkar at second slip.
length, tailing back in. Defended
back of a length outside off, another expansive heave. Missed. Eyes have to be on the ball
back of a length, angling back in but Kaleem lets this go. How does Taskin not have a wicket?
full delivery on off, pushed to mid-off for one. Awkward shot.
good length on leg, tucked to square leg.

always bound to happen. Full outside off, the ball moving away from the batsman and Kaleem tries to hit that over mid-on. Awful shot selection and Kaleem pays the price. Off the toe end to mid-on for an easy take. Just the start UAE did not need, but Bangladesh will take it.
the batsmen looking all at sea to the movement. Good length delivery, shaping back in. The ball deviates in and strikes Shahzad on the thigh
no feet movement and a drive is attempted to the outswinger. Misses it by a distance. Poor batting this.
finally bat on ball. Length on off, nicely hit to point who makes a good stop
full delivery on leg, worked past square leg for a couple.
takes off that. Bouncer on middle, Mustafa hurries away from the line. The keeper leaps and stops it.
full delivery outside off, the ball moving away. Mustafa is beaten on the expansive drive but at least the shot was there to play.
length outside off, Mustafa wafts and pokes and is beaten.
140 kph, good length on middle. Blocked back.
back of a length on middle and leg, defended back up the pitch.

phew, he connected with that. Full length on leg, Mustafa gets the delivery he wants and picks it off his pads. Massive hit over backward square leg. Leg side delivery hit over the leg side, better shot selection from Mustafa.
overpitched but down leg, Shahzad is very late on it and is struck on the pad.
crashed through the off side. Delectable shot that. Short and wide, no feet movement but hits it crisply through the covers for four
back of a length on leg, off the pad towards fine leg. Nurul, the keeper, runs around to keep them to one

taken. Beautiful catch. Lovely bowling. Out comes that offcutter on middle, Mustafa is through the shot and just pats it in the air. Mustafizur runs across and takes a good diving catch. What are they checking for? Mustafizur took it cleanly but may have grounded that while landing, reverse cup. Has it touched the ground? Is he still in the process of taking the catch, does he have total control of it? These are factors that the third umpire has to adjudicate on. It seems to me that the ball has touched the ground at some point during his landing, but when did that come. Given not out.
beautiful shot from Mustafa. Overpicthed from Mustafizur and Mustafa times it beautifully through the covers
full outside off, Mustafa is beaten on the outside edge
good length on middle and leg, pushed to mid-on
back of a length outside off, steered down to third man. Good batting
superb shot that. Full and wide outside off, Mustafa clears one foot and scythes the ball through point for four. Exceptional timing on that
good length on off, defended into the cover region
massive appeal from Nurul, not given. Back of a length delivery outside off, shaping away. Mustafa is beaten. Did not look like there was bat

this time taken. Mustafizur takes it cleanly this time. Full delivery outside off, Mustafa tries to go over the top but fails to find adequate connection. Off the outside half to third man. Big wicket
134 kph, full delivery on middle, pushed to mid-on
good length outside off, cut towards point
straight and Anwar works off his pads to square leg for one
superb timing from Shahzad. Overpitched outside off and Shahzad just smashes it back over the bowler's head for six. Good shape on his shot
back of a length outside off, the ball swerves past the outside edge
beauty again. Length delivery outside off, Shahzad is beaten again.
drifts down leg first up, wide

taken, big wicket for Bangladesh. Full delivery on off, a bit of away movement. Anwar goes back but gets a thick leading edge which flies to point who takes a great diving catch. UAE in trouble, again
full delivery, moving away. Another poke, beaten again
full on off, pushed to mid-off
short bouncer outside off, too high. Wide
length on off, awkwardly played to cover
slower delivery outside off, driven to cover
tight lines. Full on off, squeezed to point. Good over, just the two wides off it

gone. The offcutter works yet again. Fullish delivery on middle and leg, Shahzad tries to work to the leg side and closes the bat face way too early. Off the leading edge, spoons up and Mustafizur takes a dolly. UAE in big trouble now

another one. These offcutters befuddling the batsmen. Another offcutter, another leading edge, another wicket. Full on leg, the new batsman looks to flick into the leg side and the leading edge carries to mid-on this time.
ooh, almost. Another offcutter outside off, Javed pokes at it aimlessly and tries to steer the ball through a packed cordon. Beaten.
a carbon copy. Full, offcutter outside off. Another poke, the ball goes past
and another one, fullish on leg. Played to cover
too straight and worked to midwicket for a couple. Great over
good length on off, dabbed to point
inside edge for four. Full delivery outside off, the batsman bring an angled bat down, and the edge evades the keeper
good length outside off, beaten.
another one. Full length and the batsman plays with an angled bat and is beaten
finally, gets bat on it to angle to third man
good bouncer on leg, Javed lets it go past
lots of flight on off, driven to long-on
floated up on off, defended
very slow on off, lots of flight but Javed is content to block
flatter on off, slides on with the arm. Driven to the sweeper cover
terrible shot selection. Tossed up on middle and leg, usman backs away and pats to cover. There was a vacant leg side to collect one
clipped to short fine leg
flight on off, a paddle sweep fins short fine leg
very slow outside off, Usman bunts it into the leg side
short and wide, cut towards point who makes a good save. Concedes just the run
flat on off, pushed to cover
he has stepped on his own wicket. Mahmudullah fires one flat on leg, Javed flicks it nicely to short fine leg but slips over and his back foot crashes into the stumps. Symbolic of UAE's innings
slowed up on off, defended
flat on off, swept powerfully to deep square leg
yikes, stumped by a mile. Shakib saw the batsman advancing and slowed it way down, the ball pitched, gripped and ripped past the outside edge. The batsman doesn't bother to look back
tossed up on off, swept powerfully again to square leg
slow on middle, worked to midwicket
flat down leg, swept away past leg gully for four. Poor delivery, much-needed runs
another sweep, square leg runs around and keeps them down to one
flat on middle, pushed down to long-on
very slow outside off, lots of turn. Outside edge rolls towards third man
flat down leg, worked to short fine leg for a run
reverse sweep, switch hit actually. Switched his stance and hit to point.
Haider goes now. Tossed up on off, Haider comes down and drives straight to cover. Mortaza takes an easy catch.
slow on leg, nudged past leg gully for one
slow, short and wide, Lots of spin. Pushed back to the bowler
short and wide, creamed to deep point
flat on middle, and full. Anticipating the sweep shot. Played out
that'll be six. High full toss on leg stump and Usman smashes it away over backward square leg for six.
shortish again on off, pulled to deep midwicket
flight on middle, blocked
full delivery outside off, steered to point
offcutter on off, dabbed down towards point for a quick run
129 kph. full on off, played away to point
another offcutter on leg, played away
back of a length outside off, defended with an angled bat to gully
another offcutter on middle, properly blocked.
good short delivery. On middle and leg and Usman helps it along its way, over fine leg for a big hit.
full on a fourth-stump line. The ball swerves past the outside edge
bowled im. Full on off, Usman plays down the line but the ball moves just enough to beat the outside edge of Usman and rattle into off stump. End of a determined innings
full outside off, what an expansive shot that was. Naveed cleared one foot and looked to go down the ground but off the toe end it carries to the cover boundary. How did that get there?
big hoick again. Good length outside off, missed

dropped. Another catch that Sarkar should have taken. Full delivery outside off, Naveed looks to smash it away but gets a thick outside edge which flies to Sarkar at a wide slip. He spills another and the ball deflects off his hand to the boundary
what a beauty. Full delivery outside off, the offcutter beats the outside edge
low full toss outside off, smeared towards square leg
back of a length on off, beaten
huge swing. Offcutter spins past the off stump. Another big heave is missed
low full toss on off, pushed to cover
another offcutter outside off, beaten again.
slowed up on middle, swept to fine leg
blocked off the front foot
some more flight on off, swept over midwicket this time for a couple. Did not get that off the middle at all

that will be it. Slower delivery outside off, the ball rips past the outside edge again and Raza is way down the track. The keeper whips off the middle stump from the ground itself. Bangladesh have a 51-run win
